title: Metaverse-Based Mathematics Project Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematical modeling and basic operation skills for metaverse platforms
context.additional_context: A process for R&D practitioners to design and execute mathematical problem-solving projects in metaverse spaces, utilizing personal VR devices or smart devices in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can model mathematical problems as 3D simulations in a metaverse environment.
Learners can design project-based learning activities using collaboration tools in virtual spaces.
Learners can develop assessment rubrics applying the four core hubs (instructional design, knowledge, technology, talent) of the metaverse learning design framework.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
